definition: to include (in a list etc)/to assign (to a class, a work unit etc)
to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: His daughter was classed in Class B.
The new train will be formed into the regular timetable from next Monday.
sentences.chinese: 下星期一起，这列新的列车将正式编入列车时刻表。

sentences.english: They have timetabled some interesting subjects.
sentences.chinese: 他们已经将一些有趣的科目编入课程表。

sentences.english: I will make it into a file with file name.
sentences.chinese: 我会将它编入有档名的档案。

sentences.english: I've budgeted for two new members of staff.
sentences.chinese: 我已经把两名新职员名额编入预算。

sentences.english: All persons and places mentioned are carefully indexed.
sentences.chinese: 所有被提及的人名和地名都仔细编入索引中。

sentences.english: The ship is expected in 2012 into a new battle.
sentences.chinese: 预计该舰2012年编入新的战斗序列。

sentences.english: The coaches held a meeting and selected the cream of the crop for the all-star team.
sentences.chinese: 教练们举行一场会议，遴选优秀选手编入明星队。

sentences.english: He catalogued the whole collection of books presented by Professor Smith.
sentences.chinese: 他把史密斯教授捐献的全部藏书编入目录中。

sentences.english: The posts of the site should be indexed fast by google and other search engines.
sentences.chinese: 该网站的员额应编入索引迅速被谷歌和其他搜索引擎。

sentences.english: We hope the teacher will class Tom in our class.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望老师能把汤姆编入我们班里。

sentences.english: Why the section of polyamines and calmodulin was edited into the chapter of plant growth substances?
sentences.chinese: 为什么把多胺和钙调素编入植物生长物质？

sentences.english: The ferry was refitted as a troop-ship and joined the fleet.
sentences.chinese: 那艘渡轮已改装为运兵船编入舰队。

sentences.english: Xia Division of Management system, in charge of embroidery.
sentences.chinese: 刘三好被编入由锺雪霞管理的司制，负责掌管刺绣。

sentences.english: No charges have been filed yet in the alleged incident.
sentences.chinese: 在这起性侵犯事件中，还没有任何控告编入档案。

sentences.english: Scottish regiments have traditionally been led into battle by pipers.
sentences.chinese: 按照传统，风笛手被编入英国陆军苏格兰团部队中。

definition: to incorporate into one's troops/to weave in
to expand (esp. by new recruitment)/to increase the army/to augment
to compile in collaboration with/to merge and reorganize (army units etc)
to assign (to a class)/to classify as/to include
to compile anew/new (version)/newly set up (part of an organization)
(of troops) to depart for/to head for
